header.title: Complex solutions for government agencies
header.text: We design and build „turnkey facilities” of any capacity, both for the network and for autonomous generation, taking into account all customer needs.

features.title: Benefits of using
features.text: Solix offers a turnkey installation of solar power plants for businesses for their own consumption. Business owners are faced with the problem of constant growth of tariffs for legal entities. A solar power panel means energy independence for business entities and the formation of a positive image of an innovative, socially responsible company in the eyes of society and potential customers. Installing your own solar power plant, you can quickly and easily increase the supplied power at the facility or create a reliable backup of important nodes, the failure of which is unacceptable.

cards.title: Cost-efficiency
cards.text: Reduce or even eliminate electricity bills. With a solar panel system, you will generate electricity free of charge for the entire 25-year life cycle of your system.

cards.title: Predictable costs
cards.text: By investing in a solar energy system now, you can lock in your electricity tariff and protect yourself from unpredictable increases in costs. Switching to solar energy will also help you better predict and manage your costs.

cards.title: Competitiveness
cards.text: Companies are quickly realizing the economic benefits of using solar energy. Since early adopters are already outstripping the competition, we suggest looking at solar energy as a way to stay competitive.

cards.title: Free of charge
cards.text: Solar energy is a free source of energy, as no one can monopolize sunlight. Your solar energy panel will start saving money from the moment you turn it on.

cards.title: Autonomy and independence
cards.text: Your own solar panel is a guarantee of your peace of mind, independence, and energy security for business and home. You will never again be worried about wind, rain, snow, or broken power lines.

tabs.title: Energy supply agreement
tabs.text: Long-term contract for the supply of electricity to industrial enterprises. No investment by the customer during the construction phase of solar energy production

list.title: Contract signing
list.text: The Supplier and the Customer sign long-term contracts for power supply at fixed price

list.title: SPP construction
list.text: The Suppler construct solar power station and synchronizes work with diesel power plant

list.title: Start-up and maintenance
list.text: The Supplier provides stable operation and maintenance of SPP

list.title: Payment for power
list.text: Pays monthly for the amount of electric power produced on solar power plant

scheme.title: Project implementation scheme
scheme.upperText:
Power supply
at a fixed rate
scheme.lowerText:
Payment for electricity
generated from SES

economy.title: Economic effect from implementation
economy.text: Installing photovoltaic (PV) panels is an initially expensive investment, but in the medium term, the energy savings achieved are already very high. Your electricity bill will be cheaper and, in addition, with bidirectional meters, you will be able to make a profit from the energy you do not use and "resell" it. This is an option for anyone who wants to save on energy consumption.

items.title: Fixed tariffs
items.text: This support scheme is aimed at manufacturers who have a power plant with a cumulative power exceeding 10 kW. This scheme is aimed at small producers, who intend to invest in generating capacity with a limit between 10 kW and 4 MW for wind installations, 1 MW for other types of generation units, such as photovoltaic, hydroelectric, and cogeneration plants on biomass and biogas.

items.title: Fixed price
items.text: This support scheme targets producers who want to invest in plants with a capacity of more than 4 MW for wind installations and 1 MW for photovoltaic and biogas cogeneration installations. Producer status is offered through auctions organized by the Government.

items.title: Direct benefits
items.text: Renewable energy producers who will use the schemes - Fixed Rate or Fixed Price - will benefit from the purchase of the entire volume of renewable energy produced for 15 years at set rates or at negotiated prices through auctions. The rates are reviewed every one year.
